calculatePurchaseAmount(double, double) - Static method in class FuelCostCalculator.FuelCostCalculator

calculateVAT(double) - Static method in class FuelCostCalculator.FuelCostCalculator
Calculate the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount, which is 12% of the purchase amount.
